text: Ara tara allahake tamra yathartha maryada deyani, yakhana tara bale, ‘allah‌ kono manusera upara kichu'i nayila karenani [1]. Baluna, ‘ke nayila kareche musara anita kitaba ya manusera jan'ya alo o hidayatasbarupa, ya tomara bibhinna prsthaya lipibad'dha kare kichu prakasa kara o anekansa gopana rakha ebam ya tomadera pitrpurusagana o tomara janate na ta'o tomaderake siksa deya hayechilo?’ Baluna, ‘allah‌i’; atahpara taderake tadera ayacita samalocanara upara chere dina, tara khela karate thakuka
